current_card.response: You drew a five!   Everbody put three fingers up, and play Never Have I Ever!

deck.response: You drew an Ace! Ace is rule, set a rule to be followed, e.g. drink with your left hand, tap your head before you drink, don't use first names, etc.
You drew a two!  Give out two drinks!
You drew a three! Take three drinks!
You drew a four! Four is whores, all women drink!
You drew a five!   Everbody put three fingers up, and play Never Have I Ever!
You drew a six!  Six is dicks, all men drink!
You drew a seven!  Seven is heaven, last player to point to the heaven drinks!
You drew an eight!  Eight is social, everybody drinks!
You drew a nine! Nine is bust a rhyme, the player who draws the card says a phrase and each person to the left says a phrase that rhymes until one player breaks the rhyme and drinks
You drew a ten! Ten is categories, you set the category then the player to the left has 5 seconds to say something within that category.  This goes till someone messes up.
You Drew a Jack! Start a waterfall. Each player starts drinking their beverage at the same time as the person to their left. No player can stop drinking until the player before them stops.
You drew a queen!  Queen is questions! Anytime anyone answers your questions they drink! Be warned, if they don't you drink!
You drew a King!  King is drinking rule. Set a rule to be followed, e.g. drink with your left hand, tap your head before you drink, don't use first names, etc.
